name: At the Mountains of Madness
desc: Eldritch horror set in Antarctica. A group of explorers are lost on their expedition.

name: Call of Cthulhu
desc: "The Call of Cthulhu" is presented as a manuscript "found among the papers of the late Francis Wayland Thurston, of Boston".

name: Dagon
desc: Dagon is a deity who presides over the Deep Ones, an amphibious humanoid race indigenous to Earth's oceans.

name: The Cats of Ulthar
desc: It is said that in Ulthar, which lies beyond the river Skai, no man may kill a cat; and this I can verily believe as I gaze upon him who sitteth purring before the fire. For the cat is cryptic, and close to strange things which men cannot see.

name: The Astronomicon
desc: The unholy book of the First United Church of Cthulhu
